title: Asian Stocks, US Treasuries Fall on Tariff Angst: Markets Wrap
description: Asian shares slipped at the open Tuesday as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats over Greenland revived trade tensions and weighed on investor appetite for risk.
content: Asian shares slipped at the open Tuesday as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats over Greenland revived trade tensions and weighed on investor appetite for risk.
